page.title: 15LEE MOOR VILLAGE-TED'S DAY.
page.content: Ted is in charge of administration at the Lee Moor depot of the English China Clays Company.Ted gets up at about 6.30 a.m. and makes a cup of tea but does not have breakfast.Some mornings Ted puts out the washing for his wife,before setting off for work at 8.45. His job includes things to do with wages,production,workers' welfare and the general running of the depot. Ted normally has a break between 1 and 2 p.m. and finishes work at about 6.20 p.m. When Ted gets home he has the cooked meal his wife has prepared.Ted has many interests outside his work. He is a councillor and involved with many societies to do with history and geography.Ted enjoys studying books and rarely goes to bed before 1 a.m. in the morning.Ted is over fifty years of age.
